title: Final Exams
description: Complete your exams for this term

preExam.readInstructions: Please read the instructions carefully before starting.

rules.readCarefully: Read each question carefully before answering.
rules.noRefresh: Do not refresh or close the page while taking the exam.
rules.timerCantPause: The exam timer cannot be paused once started.
rules.stableConnection: Make sure you have a stable internet connection.

preExam.agreeToStart: I understand the instructions and I am ready to start.
preExam.timerWarning: Once Started, The Timer Will Begin Immediately.

exam.title: Final Exam
exam.question: Question
exam.submitConfirmation: Are you sure you want to submit your exam?
exam.unansweredWarning: You have {{count}} unanswered questions. Are you sure you want to submit?
exam.timeUpMessage: Your exam time has ended. Please submit your answers.
exam.examNotFound: The exam you're looking for was not found.
exam.failedToStart: Failed to start the exam. Please try again.
exam.failedToSubmit: Failed to submit the exam. Please try again.

successModal.title: Exam Submitted Successfully
successModal.subtitle: Your Answers Have Been Saved.
successModal.congratulations: Great job! You have completed the exam successfully.
successModal.viewResultsLater: You can view your results once they are available.

result.title: Final Exam Result
result.subtitle: Review your exam performance below.
result.passedDescription: You Passed The Final Exam Successfully.
result.underReviewDescription: Your Teacher Is Reviewing Your Exam.
result.checkBackLater: Check Back Later For Your Score.
result.resultNotFound: The exam result was not found.
